episodes.title: The ‘fear’ inside Elon Musk’s Tesla ‘cult’ exposed
episodes.description:
“People really loved working for Tesla, for Musk. They thought that they were making the world a better place.”

Author of The Tesla Files Sönke Iwersen exposes

episodes.title: Musk silenced Tesla employees over autopilot flaws | Sönke Iwersen
episodes.description:
"We had complaints about these cars accelerating by themselves for no reason at all, braking for no reason at all, customers who were very afraid of their cars."

Tesla workers are frustrated with Elon Musk, as it's reported that "threats" are being made against those who speak up against the autopilot feature, says co-author of The Tesla Files, Sönke Iwersen.
